newLink.title: 【公告】共识实验室、Jackdaw Capital宣布投资区块链域名项目BitDNS
newLink.des: 新加坡时间2021年1月5日，区块链域名项目BitDNS宣布获得共识实验室、Jackdaw Capital投资。

newLink.title: 【公告】DNS将登录MXC抹茶、BitTok、BTCMAX、Btex四大交易所
newLink.des: 新加坡时间2021年1月4日14:00，MXC抹茶、BitTok、BTCMax、BTEX 四大数字资产交易平台宣布将于2021年1月6日上线DNS，并开通DNS/USDT交易对。

newLink.title: 【公告】区块链域名项目BitDNS获科银资本战略投资
newLink.des: 新加坡时间2021年1月2日，区块链域名项目BitDNS获科银资本战略投资。双方将就去中心化底层设施、技术研发、市场拓展、去中心化域名领域展开合作。

swiperList.name: Anh Nguyen
swiperList.title: BitDNS是一个非常适合商业和个人使用的项目
swiperList.content: BitDNS的技术架构适合各种经济体系，从商业上的角度来说，他能保证整个商业网络的去中心化，从个人的角度来看，BitDNS的域名服务可以大幅降低区块链参与的门槛。

swiperList.name: larueer kenbe
swiperList.title: BitDNS，一个创新的多服务平台
swiperList.content: 随着商业格局的变化，BitDNS根据相应领域的用户需求进行调整，增加了很多服务和商业运营，例如BitDNS，BitMail，BitUid等。

swiperList.name: Daniel
swiperList.title: BitDNS是最安全轻量级产品之一，具有很大的成长性
swiperList.content: BitDNS是最安全的轻量级产品之一，具有很大的成长性，涉猎广泛，尤其是对DeFi的创新，通过将产品分红价值赋予给流动性奖励，是行业先例，非常看好。

swiperList.name: zet david
swiperList.title: BitDNS的易用性将更好的鼓励年轻人参与区块链
swiperList.content: BitDNS产品的易用性将更好的鼓励年轻人来参与区块链网络。

swiperList.name: Greg Mentayor
swiperList.title: BitDNS的技术基于点对点，无需中央管理即可运行
swiperList.content: BitDNS支付交易的验证和支付交易的确认通过网络以协商一致的方式进行。

swiperList3.name: Anh Nguyen
swiperList3.title: BitDNS - suitable for commercial and personal use
swiperList3.content: BitDNS accelerates mass adoption with readable domain nameInstead of long wallet address, BitDNS provides a readable domain name, that can be linked to cryptocurrencies address for users to receive and send crypto. Enterprise with a decentralised domain name ensures business continuity as it is secured and belongs to the enterprise forever.

swiperList3.name: larueer kenbe
swiperList3.title: BitDNS is an innovative multi-service platform that serves exchange valuable information safely
swiperList3.content: BitDNS’s infrastructure platform innovates continuously by increasing their product range to keep up with the rapid industry demands. Products includes; BitDNS, BitMail, BitUid, BitChat, BitAPP etc.

swiperList3.name: Daniel
swiperList3.title: BitDNS is one of the most secure with light client, with great growth potential
swiperList3.content: BitDNS is one of the most secure and lightweight client. Light clients are crucial elements in blockchain ecosystems. It helps us access and interact with a blockchain without having to sync the full blockchain. OR By holding on the their governance token- CORN, I receive dividends. It’s great!

swiperList3.name: zet david
swiperList3.title: The ease of use of BitDNS will better encourage young people to participate in the blockchain
swiperList3.content: The ease of use of BitDNS products will be better encourage young people to participate in the blockchain network.

swiperList3.name: Greg Mentayor
swiperList3.title: The ease of use of BitDNS products will be better encourage young people to participate in the blockchain network.
swiperList3.content: The ease of use of BitDNS products will be better encourage young people to participate in the blockchain network.

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 多链架构
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 同时支持网关层及Level2层跨链协议（包括波卡和Cosmos），全新分布式多链域名系统。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 预言机
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 支持ChainLink预言机，并以BitDNS域名系统为预言服务命名。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 身份认证
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 应用指纹、人脸和虹膜的生物识别技术，作为用户的区块链密钥随机种子之一，通过生物特征识别用户、同时通过区块链技术和零知识证明保证用户隐私的生物特征信息不会外泄。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 可信任的DeFi系统
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 支持DAO+的DEX交易所，由域名确定Token的唯一性，避免假币和山寨币。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 边缘计算
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: BitDNS矿机不仅为公链提供计算节点，还为IPFS提供存储节点，同时还可提供基于边缘云计算服务的云电脑、云直播、云游戏，直接对标阿里巴巴最新的云电脑技术。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 云路由器
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 以硬件钱包、智能路由、家庭NAS系统为核心的云路由器，未来的智慧家庭中心，通过区块链技术解决物联网设备之间的信任和用户数据保护问题，避免目前传统摄像头被侵入导致的隐私泄漏问题。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: IPv8
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: 基于SWAN技术的网络自适应动态组网技术，能够在互联网成千上万的节点之间，组建起双层高速互联网络，能够成功突破网络围墙，大幅减少跨境网络访问延迟。未来还能接入SpaceX的StarLink星链网络，组成空地一体化互联网络。

home_technologyAdvantage.name: 抗量子计算加密算法
home_technologyAdvantage.detail: BitDNS将在后续版本中，全面支持抗量子计算的加密算法，做好迎接量子计算时代的准备，防止量子计算机普及后对区块链网络造成的巨大影响。

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Multi Chain Architecture
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: BitDNS uses multi-chain architecture which supports both gateway layer and layer cross-chain protocols (including Polkadot and Cosmos), and a new distributed multi-chain domain name system.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Oracles
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: Support ChainLink which can name the oracle service after BitDNS domain name system

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Identity authentication
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: biometrics using fingerprint, face and iris as one of the user's blockchain key random seeds. Biometrics are used to identify users, and at the same time blockchain technology with zero knowledge proof to ensure user’s privacy.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Trusted DeFi system
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: supports DEX and DAO+ exchanges. The uniqueness of Token is determined by the domain name, and counterfeit coins and altcoins are avoided.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Edge computing technology
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: BitDNS mining machine not only provides computing nodes for the public chain, but also provides storage nodes for IPFS. It can also provide cloud computers, cloud live broadcasts, and cloud games based on edge cloud computing services. It can directly benchmark Alibaba's latest cloud computing technology.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Cloud router
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: a cloud router supports hardware wallets, smart routers, and home NAS systems as the core. Through blockchain technology we aim to solve the problem of trust between IoT devices and protects users data privacy by preventing camera data leakage.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: IPv8
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: The adaptive dynamic networking technology is based on SWAN technology and can form a double-layer high-speed interconnection network between thousands of nodes on the Internet. These nodes can successfully break through firewall and greatly increase speed of cross-border network access. In the future, it can access SpaceX's StarLink network to form an integrated interconnection network.

home_technologyAdvantage2.name: Anti-quantum computing encryption algorithm
home_technologyAdvantage2.detail: BitDNS will fully support anti-quantum computing encryption algorithms in subsequent versions and will prepare for quantum computing. BitDNS will be quantum resistant.

timeLineList.info: BitUID+BitDNS域名注册、交易、管理APP上线
BitDNS钱包1.0版上线、BitMail邮箱系统核心模块上线
BitDNS 一键上云、一键链化工具上线、BitMail邮箱系统完成
IPv8/rTCP去中心化云计算网络建成

timeLineList2.info: BitUID+BitDNS domain name will be officially launched, transaction and APP will be online
BitDNS domain name resolution client/APP will be online
BitDNS wallet version 1.0 will be launched, BitMail mailbox system core module will be launched
BitDNS one-click cloud access, one-click chain tool will be available
IPv8/rTCP decentralized cloud computing network will be completed
